body_html: You also need to start the chief queue runner which will start the synchronization thread. Please follow the comments and example in the sync_replicas_optimizer.py. Another example is the inception_distributed_train.py in tensorflow/models/inception

body: You also need to start the chief queue runner which will start the synchronization thread. Please follow the comments and example in the sync_replicas_optimizer.py. Another example is the inception_distributed_train.py in tensorflow/models/inception
